articles.content:
As for Chetan Sharma-led committee's future, there is a lot riding on India's performance in the ongoing T20 World Cup © BCCI
In the middle of Chetan Sharma's media conference on Monday (October 31)… [+3433 chars]

articles.author: Peter Doggers
articles.title: Anna Muzychuk Through To Semifinals As Humpy Koneru Blunders Piece - Chess.com
articles.description: GM Anna Muzychuk reached the semifinals of the 2022-2023 FIDE Women's Candidates Tournament after winning her tiebreak match vs. GM Humpy Koneru on Sunday. After three draws, the Indian grandmaster blundered a full piece and quickly resigned. Muzychuk will no…
